mapper.select: select tn.notice_title , tn.reg_date , ui.name as writer , tn.notice_content , tn.notice_no , tn.file_cd , tf.file_name , tf.file_size , tf.file_nadd , tf.file_madd from tb_notice tn join tb_userinfo ui on tn.loginID = ui.loginID left join tb_file tf on tn.file_cd = tf.file_cd where tn.notice_no = #{noticeno}
mapper.update: update tb_notice set is_delete = 1 where notice_no = #{noticeno}
update tb_notice set notice_count = notice_count + 1 where notice_no = #{notice_no}
